==Profile==
Domenico is a prisoner in the [[Fortress of Meropide]] who sent a blackmail letter to [[Kiara]], threatening to kidnap her. Domenico also once tried to rouse the prisoners' resentment and hatred to incite a color revolution against [[Wriothesley]] and Neuvillette. Eventually, Domenico confessed to his crimes and sending the letter, and Wriothesley has [[Sigewinne]] take Domenico away to the detention center.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|In a New Light}}</ref>
